title: Software Developer
description: Worked in two different projects B2B and StaplesConnect marketing applications concentrating on web application technologies like Reactjs, Angular cli and Angular Universal Server-Side Rendering (SSR) by Agile methodology. Using Sass pre-processor and modules of bootstrap in styling the User interface.
Working in Hippo (bloomreach) CMS for content management for better business configurations of the contents used in the application.
Working on pages from scratch from creating Initial routes and developing components/containers for the pages to serve them on the server-side.

Implementing various screens for the front-end using ReactJS and used various predefined components from NPM

Using Bootstrap for responsive web designing
Creating protractor end-to-end tests as well as Karma, Jasmine unit tests for all the components created.

Collaborating with different team members like Product Owner, Product Manager, project manager, designers, leads and business team to make sure the requirements are clear in all the perspectives.
